DOC.brief_summary: The goal study compare amount time fetal heart tone trace baby beyond viability use traditional device compare Monica device .
DOC.detailed_description: If patient admit antepartum service 24 - 28 week gestation , investigator approach patient inform study . If patient agrees study baby 's heart trace contraction pattern start monitor use traditional device . If patient would receive continuous fetal heart rate monitoring , least 2 hour monitor traditional device , traditional device would replace Monica device 2 hour . After Monica device use 2 hour , traditional device would use . The entire length patient 's participation study 6 hour . The data collection sheet show data element collect medical record . In addition standard care monitor strip become part medical record also review per data collection sheet . Time take review patient medical record 1 hour . Total time patient 's involvement 7 hour .
DOC.criteria: Pregnant patient 24 28 week admit antepartum service Patients non viable pregnancy Patients multiple gestation Clinically Unstable patient Non English speaking patient
